title: <NuxtLayout>
description: Nuxt provides the <NuxtLayout> component to show layouts on pages and error pages.

props.className: language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight

children.value: To get the ref of a layout component, access it through

props.className: language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight
props.code:
<script setup lang="ts">
const layout = ref()

function logFoo () {
  layout.value.layoutRef.foo()
}
</script>

<template>
  <NuxtLayout ref="layout">
    default layout
  </NuxtLayout>
</template>
